Interface GameConsoleRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
JdbcGameConsoleRepository, JpaGameConsoleRepository
public interface GameConsoleRepository
Repository interface for managing GameConsole entities. Follows the repository pattern to abstract the data access operations.

  • Method Details

    • findByGameConsoleId

      Optional<GameConsole> findByGameConsoleId(int gameConsoleId)
      Busca una relación GameConsole por su ID único.
      Parameters:
      gameConsoleId - el ID de la relación GameConsole
      Returns:
      un Optional con la relación encontrada, o vacío si no existe

    • deleteByGameConsoleId

      boolean deleteByGameConsoleId(int gameConsoleId)
      Elimina una relación GameConsole por su ID único.
      Parameters:
      gameConsoleId - el ID de la relación GameConsole a eliminar
      Returns:
      true si se eliminó, false si no existía

    • findById

      Optional<GameConsole> findById(int gameId, int consoleId)
      Finds a record by its composite primary key: gameId and consoleId. Returns an Optional to avoid errors if no result is found.

    • save

      GameConsole save(GameConsole gameConsole)
      Saves or updates a record in the database. Returns the saved GameConsole object.

    • delete

      void delete(GameConsole gameConsole)
      Deletes a record from the database. Takes the entity to be deleted as a parameter.

    • deleteById

      boolean deleteById(int gameId, int consoleId)
      Deletes a record using its composite key: gameId and consoleId. Returns true if successfully deleted, false if it did not exist.

    • count

      long count()
      Counts how many records exist in the GameConsole table. Returns the total number of records as a long.

    • existsById

      boolean existsById(int gameId, int consoleId)
      Checks whether a record exists with the given identifiers. Returns true if the record exists, false otherwise.
